column5: Hi guys Just had a knee replacement 4 weeks ago still pretty sore but coming along . Starting thing about muskie season . Trying to get some info on Stoco lake near Tweed Ontario like places to stay and how the muskie fishing is . Planing on fishing it for 3 days on our way to the Kawarthas on our annual trip . You can send me a pm if you want . Thanks for the help . Hank Jr
